text:
e="preserve">Joey Image (born Joey Poole; 5 March 1957 – 1 June 2020) was an American punk rock drummer. He joined the Misfits in November 1978. He was the drummer for both the "Horror Business" and "Night of the Living Dead" in 1979. He was born in Weehawken, New Jersey.
In 2016, he was diagnosed with liver cancer. Image died on 1 June 2020 in Florida from the disease, aged 63.
